trans-unit.source: I had the same issue as yours and this solution fixed it.
trans-unit.target: 我也遇到了和你一样的问题,这个解决方案解决了。

trans-unit.source: I have checked my PHP ini file (php.ini) and display_errors is set and also error reporting is E_ALL. I have restarted my Apache webserver.
trans-unit.target: 我已经检查了我的PHP ini文件（ php.ini ）并设置了 display_errors ，并且错误报告为 E_ALL 。 我已经重新启动了Apache Web服务器。

trans-unit.source: I have even put these lines at the top of my script, and it doesn't even catch simple parse errors. For example, I declare variables with a "$" and I don't close statements";". But all my scripts show a blank page on these errors, but I want to actually see the errors in my browser output.
trans-unit.target: 我什至把这些行放在脚本的顶部，它甚至没有捕获简单的解析错误。 例如，我用 "$" 声明变量，而不关闭语句 ";" 。 但是我的所有脚本在这些错误上均显示空白页，但是我想在浏览器输出中实际看到错误 。

trans-unit.source: To display all errors you need to:
trans-unit.target: 要显示所有的错误,你需要。

trans-unit.source: Turn off all error reporting
trans-unit.target: 关闭所有错误报告

trans-unit.source: Type: int, Default value: 0, Introduced in Xdebug >= 2.3 This setting is a bitmask, like error_reporting. This bitmask will be logically ORed with the bitmask represented by error_reporting to dermine which errors should be displayed. This setting can only be made in php.ini and allows you to force certain errors from being shown no matter what an application does with ini_set().
trans-unit.target: 类型：int，默认值：0，在Xdebug> = 2.3中引入。此设置是位掩码，例如error_reporting。 该位掩码将与error_reporting表示的位掩码进行逻辑或运算，以确定应该显示哪些错误。 此设置只能在php.ini中进行，无论应用程序如何使用ini_set（）都可以使您强制显示某些错误。

trans-unit.source: Type: int, Default value: 0, Introduced in Xdebug >= 2.3 If this setting is set to 1 then errors will always be displayed, no matter what the setting of PHP's display_errors is.
trans-unit.target: 类型：int，默认值：0，在Xdebug> = 2.3中引入。如果将此设置设置为1，则无论PHP的display_errors设置如何，都会始终显示错误。

trans-unit.source: Use:
trans-unit.target: Use:

trans-unit.source: What is left to do?
trans-unit.target: 还能做什么?

trans-unit.source: When using PHP as an Apache module, we can a change the configuration settings using directives in Apache configuration files (e.g. httpd.conf) and .htaccess files. You will need “AllowOverride Options” or “AllowOverride All” privileges to do so.
trans-unit.target: 当使用PHP作为Apache模块时，我们可以使用Apache配置文件（例如httpd.conf）和.htaccess文件中的指令来更改配置设置。 您将需要“ AllowOverride选项”或“ AllowOverride全部”特权。

trans-unit.source: While your site is live, the php.ini file should have display_errors disabled for security reasons. However, for the development environment, display_errors can be enabled for troubleshooting.
trans-unit.target: 当您的站点处于活动状态时，出于安全原因， php.ini 文件应禁用display_errors。 但是，对于开发环境，可以启用display_errors进行故障排除。

trans-unit.source: You can add the following line:
trans-unit.target: 你可以加上下面这一行。

trans-unit.source: You can add your own custom error handler, which can provide extra debug information. Furthermore, you can set it up to send you the information via email.
trans-unit.target: 你可以添加你自己的自定义错误处理程序,它可以提供额外的调试信息。此外,你可以设置它通过电子邮件向你发送信息。

trans-unit.source: You can check for syntax errors in your script by running (at the command line):
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过运行(在命令行)来检查你的脚本中的语法错误。

trans-unit.source: You can do something like below:
trans-unit.target: 你可以做下面这样的事情。

trans-unit.source: You can do this by changing the php.ini file and add the following
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过修改php.ini文件并添加以下内容来实现这个功能

trans-unit.source: You can't catch parse errors when enabling error output at runtime, because it parses the file before actually executing anything (and since it encounters an error during this, it won't execute anything). You'll need to change the actual server configuration so that display_errors is on and the approriate error_reporting level is used. If you don't have access to php.ini, you may be able to use .htaccess or similar, depending on the server.
trans-unit.target: 当你在运行时启用错误输出时,你无法捕捉到解析错误,因为它在实际执行任何事情之前会对文件进行解析(因为在这期间它遇到了错误,所以不会执行任何事情)。你需要改变服务器的实际配置,使display_errors处于开启状态,并使用approriate error_reporting级别。如果你没有访问php.ini,你可以使用.htaccess或者类似的东西,这取决于服务器。

trans-unit.source: You might find all of the settings for "error reporting" or "display errors" do not appear to work in PHP 7. That is because error handling has changed. Try this instead:
trans-unit.target: 您可能会发现“错误报告”或“显示错误”的所有设置在PHP 7中似乎都不起作用。这是因为错误处理已更改。 尝试以下方法：

trans-unit.source: You might want to use this code:
trans-unit.target: 你可能会想用这个代码。

trans-unit.source: force_display_errors
trans-unit.target: force_display_errors

trans-unit.source: force_error_reporting
trans-unit.target: force_error_reporting

trans-unit.source: or simply
trans-unit.target: 或干脆
